name: Aishabai & Haji Abdul Latif Charitable Trust

address: 2nd Floor, JJ Shatabdi Muncipal School Building,
Gate No.14, JJ Hospital Compound, Byculla

briefDescription: Aishabai & Haji Abdul Latif Charitable Trust has been working sincerely for the service of humanity since the year 1980.The Trust believes that a firm foundation in education goes a long way in helping each individual to lead a better life and fulfill their hopes and aspirations in their chosen career. It also enables them to overcome deprivation due to poverty while helping them to develop the capacity to create a promising future not only for themselves but also their community and nation as whole.The Main Aims and Objectives of the Trustis to raise and promote social, cultural, education and humanitarian standards and help in ameliorate the conditions of down trodden minorities and backward classes.
